meanings.sent1: The two parallel lines were nonintersecting, never crossing each other.
meanings.sent2: The nonintersecting roads ran alongside each other without ever meeting.
meanings.sent3: The nonintersecting paths in the maze made it impossible to find the way out.
meanings.sent4: Their opinions were nonintersecting, leading to a lack of agreement.
meanings.sent5: The nonintersecting flight paths of the birds created a beautiful pattern in the sky.

meanings.definition: Not meeting or crossing at any point
meanings.sent1: The nonintersecting lines on the graph never touched each other.
meanings.sent2: The nonintersecting rivers flowed in different directions without converging.
meanings.sent3: The nonintersecting schedules of the two friends made it hard to find time to meet.
meanings.sent4: Their interests were nonintersecting, making it difficult to find common ground.
meanings.sent5: The nonintersecting paths of the hikers ensured they wouldn't accidentally cross each other's route.
